sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_news_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domainid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(64) not null, viewtemplate int2 not null, vrole varchar(64), createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(parentid, text), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_news ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, domainid char(32), cname varchar(32), status int2 not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, keywords varchar(128), author varchar(32), source varchar(32), imagemark bool not null, videomark bool not null, contentmark int4 not null, videotime int4 not null, rlevel int2 not null, comments int4 not null, lastcommentdate timestamp, allowcomments bool not null, indexed bool not null, views int4 not null, description varchar(256), content text, oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_news_comment ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, ccomment text not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_news_recommend ( id char(32) not null, newsid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, status int2 not null, rlevel int4 not null, dstartdate timestamp, denddate timestamp, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );
create table sf_news_stat ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32), domainid char(32), nums int4 not null, nums_publish int4 not null, nums_delete int4 not null, primary key(id) );
